items.title: One tag

items.content_html:
This is a test to see if we might accept tags with # but silently drop them from the tag list.

When we reserialize this source file, the octothorpes will be removed.

I’m OK with this (re: iOS Bear app).
items.title: Has hashtags

items.content_html: Uh oh, this file doesn’t have a title!
items.title: no-title

items.content_html: This file sets up some attributes that should cause some social media tags to get created in the resulting HTML, under the right circumstances.
items.title: Metatags

items.content_html:
This file sets up some attributes that should cause some social media tags to get created in the resulting HTML, under the right circumstances.

Furthermore, it refers to a post-specific image. But it doesn’t specify a description! It does have a hyperlink in the first paragraph, though.
items.title: Metatags with image
